column1: back of a length and angling away outside off, it does not bounce as much as Finch expected it to. It slides under the swinging bat
this keeps low as well. Ah, interesting. So Un-Chinnaswamy. Full and angled across Finch. He aims for a cut and does not connect
veering into the pads on a back of a length, Smith tickles it off the pad towards square leg
short, top of off, Baz hangs back and blocks to cover
keeps it short and just outside off, Finch is early into the pull and does not connect
gentle length ball on off, Baz gets forward and pushes a single to mid-off

Baz steps out and holes out to AB at deep cover! Abdulla strikes first ball and is mobbed by his team-mates. He tosses it on off and finds some turn to foil the timing. Baz can only miscue it to AB. He just sliced it
nearly another wicket. Flatter and outside off, Finch slashes an outside edge, sends it flying over a leaping Gayle at slip
backs away and flashes a cut to cover

Gayle catches this edge at slip. Finch and Baz gone within two overs. Dangled up on middle, he finds a hint of turn again. Finch is tempted to whip it away and edges it. He was tempted by the big gap at midwicket. Gayle takes a chest-high catch
straighter one on off, pushed through the covers for one
lobbed up outside off, Raina stretches forward and drives to mid-off
length ball on off, DK walks down the pitch and works it to mid-on for one
short and ducks in outside off, Raina aims for a big drive and misses
short and keeps low outside off again. Raina cuts and the ball slides under the bat
shorter one on off, Raina hops and dabs it towards midwicket. DK wants one but is sent back
length ball on off, not sure why Raina hopped there. Perhaps, he was waiting back for the short one. Nudged to midwicket
full and angling away outside off, DK opens the face of the bat and runs it towards point
full and angling away outside off, Raina reaches out and pokes it back to the bowler
full and outside off, Raina is forward to bunt it to mid-on
dug in short and outside off, Raina plays away from the body and slices it to the covers

Watson gets the big wicket of Raina! Bounced out, again! Watson bangs a chest-high short ball on middle. Raina aims to pull. He ends up flapping it in the air. Aravind takes a smart, low catch at short fine leg. Plucked it inches from the turf
full and into the pads, picked away to square leg
back of a length on off, Smith hangs back and defends it back to the bowler
slides on off, Smith punches it to long-on off the back foot
slows this up on off, stops a bit on the batsman, tapped to the covers for one
dropped short on off, no turn, right in the hitting arc of Smith. He short-arm pulls it over a leaping Watson at square leg
short and wide outside off, Smith cashes in, cracking a cut past backward point
pushed through on middle and leg, goes low and sweeps to short fine leg
short and outside off, DK rises on top of the bounce and punches to point
DK steps out, this stops on the surface, and opens up the batsman. Pokes an outside edge to third man
short on off, Smith goes deep in the crease and whips to deep midwicket
DK steps out and is yorked. He jabs it out to cover
offcutter outside off, extra bounce, beats the groping bat
overpitched and outside off, DK carves it to point
full and slipping down leg, wide
back of a length and angled in, off the thigh and pops to the leg side
short and outside off, slower ball. Smith swings and drags an inside edge onto the pad
back of a length and on off, punched back to Jordan
leg-stump short ball, Smith swivels on the back foot and powers a pull over backward square leg. Nailed that!
tucked off the hips to long leg for one
full slower ball on off, DK waits patiently and runs it towards point
flighted on off, open-faced drive to sweeper cover
full and skids on middle, pushed to long-on
loopy legbreak, eased to sweeper cover again
another loopy legbreak, Smith clears his front leg and slices it over the covers
dragged short and turns away outside off, DK reaches out and slashes it to long-off
tossed on the leg stump, stops on the batsman. He looks to flick and spoons a leading edge in front of cover
floated full and outside off, driven to long-off on the front foot
banged in short and outside off, chopped to the off side
Binny rolls his fingers across this cutter outside off, leaves Smith. Bounces twice on its way to Rahul. Smith swiped early and missed
Binny bangs a rising short ball on off, the batsman steps out, takes his eyes off the ball. One leg is in the air. Top-edged pull over backward square leg
overpitched on off, driven straight down the ground, so much so it hits the stumps at the striker's end
116ks slower short ball from Binny, Smith heaves early and drags an inside edge to square leg
floated full and on the leg stump, Smith lofts it cleanly over long-on for six
pitches outside leg and turns to beat the sweep and hit the pad
beats AB to his right at long-off. Tossed full on middle, Smith steps away, makes room, and lofts this over the bowler's head
short and wide outside off, slapped out to sweeper cover
extra bounce and turn outside off,  DK gets on top of the bounce and punches to cover point for a quick one. The throw from Baby was off radar
slides on outside off, the batsman slashes and chops it behind, sneaks through the legs of Rahul for four
drifting full and down leg, DK goes low and bottom-edges a sweep to the left of Rahul
shorter on off, slower through the air, DK punches it calmly to long-off
slider on middle, no turn, Smith goes low and sweeps behind square on the leg side
dangled up outside off, turns away further, off-side wide
Abdulla lands this on off and gets it to turn away. DK dabs it late to backward point
pushed through quicker, turn and bounce. DK has a big whoosh at it and misses
flighted on middle, Smith respects it and blocks to cover
tossed on off, patted to the covers
DK steps out, does not meet the pitch, takes it on the thigh. Drops it in front of his feet
dangled up on off, DK checks his loft and chips it in front of long-on
turn and bounce, stops on the batsman as well. He checks his shot and pops it in front of the bowler
dropped slightly short on middle, Smith is quick to launch into it. He rocks back and crunches a pull into the stands beyond midwicket. And the run rate has touched six
DK shuffles across off, even before the spinner bowled this flat on middle. Goes low and sweeps firmly over square leg
quick fizzer outside off, wide, left alone
fired on the leg stump, DK does not connect with this sweep. Off the pad and rolls to Rahul
spins away from DK, he manages to drag this sweep to midwicket
skids on flat and outside off, swiped away to the right of long-on
floated on off, Smith goes low and sweeps it, clearing long-on. He brings up his half-century
short and outside off, sticks in the surface, punched to long-off
slow dipping full toss, driven down the ground
back of a length on off, dabbed to backward point
Jordan hunts for a yorker, he has to settle with a low full toss on middle, flicked to deep square leg
full and slow outside off, DK shuffles across, waits, and laps it to fine leg

DK drags it back onto the leg stump. The failed encore. This was full and outside off, not slow. DK shuffles across for another lap-sweep. He can only guide it back onto the stumps. Fine leg was in the deep. Questionable shot selection. But with DK, there is a love-hate relationship with these dinky shots
full and outside off, front-foot drive to cover
full on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket
short on off, hangs back and picks it away past midwicket
leg-stump full toss, Smith picks it up and dispatches it over deep square leg
back of a length cutter outside off, swipes early and misses
full toss on the stumps, flicked to deep midwicket
banged short and outside off, chopped behind point
back of a length, cramps Jadeja for room, stabbed back to the bowler
dug in short and outside off, chopped to backward point
full and wide outside off, past the tramline
back of a length on middle and off, chopped down to third man
wide yorker, 141ks, Smith reaches out and drags it to short fine leg off an inside edge
Watson comes back and strikes! Short and width outside off, Jadeja scythes it in the air. Gayle flings to his left at backward point and completes the catch
Watson greets Bravo with a chest-high short ball on off, awkwardly fended to square leg
full and straightens on middle, worked behind square
shot! pushed through outside off, skids on. Smith goes low and pings a slog over midwicket

and Smith holes out to Kohli. Quicker one, short and wide outside off, gets turn as well. This means that the batsman has to fetch it from wide outside off. Drags a pull off the toe-end. It lodges into the hands of Kohli at long-on. He blows a kiss and celebrates the catch. Smith raises his bat as he walks back
tossed on middle, poked to the leg side
slides on the leg stump, Dwivedi aims for a sweep-scoop. His  bat lies flat, inside-edges it to fine leg
floated on off, run down to point
full and outside off, driven to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, forced to cover
full and darted down leg, Rahul dives and collects the ball
full toss on off, Bravo carves it stylishly through sweeper cover. He deliberate opened the face of the bat and played it in the gap
overpitched and outside off, drilled to long-off with a flourish

near-perfect leg-stump yorker, curves in, Dwivedi is hustled for pace. Off the boot and runs all the way to the third-man boundary. The angle was carrying the ball down leg. A good ball goes for four legbyes

absolutely plumb. A well-executed yorker on off and middle, tailing back in late. Dwivedi shuffles across and misses his flick. The ball swerves in late and hits Dwivedi in front of middle. No doubt about that. Umpire Chaudhary gets that one wrong. A run given but no inside edge
shot! Dwivedi steps out and gets a full ball outside off. He lifts it sweetly over extra cover for six. Inside-out strike
slower legcutter from Watson, Dwivedi waits, sits deep in the crease and thumps it over midwicket. Pulled away with authority

six, six, and out! Kohli dives forward and takes a superb catch at long-on. He is pumped. He throws the ball away in anger. He belts out some expleletives. Typical Kohli celebration. The batsman is asked to wait. The RCB captain, meanwhile, sips some drinks at the edge of the boundary. The on-field umpires get together and refer it to the third umpire. Did Kohli take it cleanly? Looks like a clean catch. The TV umpire rules it out after multiple replays. Kohli doffs his hat and Alan Donald gives him a pat on the back. Cool down, captain. Dwivedi came down the track and dragged the short ball to the fielder. Kohli had gone low, getting his fingers underneath the ball. His right hand let the ball pop out, but Kohli hung onto it

Bravo is bowled. Umpire Dharmasena calls the TV umpire again. Is is a back foot no-ball? Back of a length, wicket-to-wicket stuff, Bravo loses his shape, slogs and Watson hits the middle and leg stumps. Eish, Has Watson cut the crease with the back leg? It looks mighty close. Looks like the toe is on the line. He gets away with it. Watson is more relieved than pleased
slower bouncer down the leg side, wide
hacked between deep midwicket and long-on. Kohli runs to his right from long-on, dives, but can't prevent a four. He is distraught with himself for that lapse. He is seething
full and outside off, the batsman gets under it and swings it over extra cover for four
the batsman steps away and slices it to deep cover
full and outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
full on off at 143ks, not a yorker, Praveen makes room swings and misses. Jordan pings the off stump. It gets tiled back
bouncer down the leg side, wide
full at the leg stump, slogged to long-on
the batsman backs away outside leg, Jordan follows him. Clipped to deep midwicket. They go for the second. Dhawal is caught short on the second. Rahul gathers the throw and flips the bails off
full and heading down leg, wide called
full and heading down leg again, Gayle glances it fine for four
full and angling across the left-hander, left alone
back of a length and outside off, Gayle loads up for a big hit. He can only toe-end it past the bowler
wicket-to-wicket line, dabbed to cover
wild full ball down leg, left alone. DK can't stop it despite a wide. It was that wild
picked away off the hips to deep midwicket
full and angled in on off, Kohli presses forward and blocks it solidly
short ball on the leg stump, Kulkarni looks to cramp the batsman for room. Deflected to short fine leg

Kohli has chopped on for a duck, his first after 51 T20 innings. Short and wide outside off, does not come on to the batsman. Kohli has a leaden-footed slash at it. Swishes away from the body and drags it back onto the base of the off stump off the bottom edge. The ball didn't rise as much as Kohli expected. Huge wicket for Kulkarni
back of a length and outside off, guided to point
short and outside off, punched to cover, where there is a fumble by Raina
banged in short, this kicked up off the surface, beats the hook and pings Gayle on the grille of the helmet
back of a length and outside off, does not come onto Gayle. He swings and toe-ends it over the mid-off fielder
back of a length and outside off, punched to cover
shortish and outside off, slow surface. Slapped to the covers
full and outside off, AB plays late, and launches it high and over long-off. Clean swing
short on off, whipped to midwicket
full on middle, 106ks offcutter, Gayle waits and angles it to point
full and down leg, diverted off the pad to short fine leg
slower ball on middle, defended
Gayle is gone as well! Kulkarni roars. This was full on off, Gayle sat back for a big leg-side swipe. He can't touch it. Kulkarni rattles the off stump

Rahul has nicked off for a duck! Good length and nips away late outside off, opens up the new batsman. He pokes and edges to slip. Smith dives to his right and takes it. Kulkarni has ripped through the RCB top order
length ball on off, Watson presses forward and defends
back of a length on off, played back to the bowler
similar length on middle, stops on Watson. He aims to flick and is opened up. Stabbed towards point
slides on outside off, punched to long-off
tossed on the leg stump, stops on Watson. He checks his shot and chips in front of mid-on
fired flat and straight, whipped to deep midwicket
tossed on off, pushed back to the bowler. Jadeja fumbles but keeps it to a dot
Jadeja pushes it at 100ks, but this surface is slow. Watson is already through with the slog sweep. The ball grazes the cue end. Smith dives forward at slip to pouch it
flat on off, pushed back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, stops a bit on AB. Flat-batted to cover
back of a length and angling away outside off, tapped to cover
fourth wicket for Kulkarni. RCB are reeling at 29 for 5. Back of a length and outside off, Baby comes forward and drives it in the air.... into the hands of Jakati at extra cover. Loose, loose shot
back of a length on off, pushed to cover
short and angled in on off, tucked to midwicket
full at off stump, AB slices it down to third man
full on off, dabbed to the left of short extra cover
pushed to the covers
drifts in, kicks up, grips and turns away, stabbed to point
full and straight, whipped to long-on
quick turn for Jadeja, finds the outside edge and runs away past slip
tossed up too full on off, AB steps forward and crunches a cover drive. Beats Kulkarni's dive at the sweeper boundary
short and outside off, leans back and chops to backward point. Jadeja did not collect the ball cleanly. He missed the direct hit
full and on middle, punched to long-on
too full and outside off, wristy drive to sweeper cover
back of a length on off, slapped to deep point
rising short ball on off, does not come on, flat-batted to midwicket
short on off, AB gets on top of the bounce and punches crisply to sweeper cover
slides on short and wide outside off, the batsman chops and under-edges it, sneaks through the legs of DK
Binny steps out, this is darted short and outside off. Carved over backward point
dangled up full on middle, Binny sweeps and places it past short fine leg
Binny shuffles across off, this is pushed down leg. Wide
dangled up on off, Binny steps out, meets the pitch, and launches it sweetly over long-off
down the track and pushed back to the bowler
Binny uses his feet again, this is fired flat, defended back
short and outside off, AB goes back and forces to long-off
length ball on off, guided to cover
AB taps this off-stump ball to cover

Binny is out lbw! Did that hit Binny outside off? Just outside off. Slides on, Binny misses the sweep and is rapped on the front pad. Umpire AK Chaudhary raises his finger. RCB's procession continues. Kohli is on his feet in the dug out. He is furious
skiddy one outside off, clipped to midwidket
short and turns away outside off, swatted to midwicket
fired on off, flat-batted back to the bowler
back of a length and turns away, stabbed to point
darted at 94ks, tapped back to the bowler
Abdulla shimmies out, Jakati bowls a full toss above the waist line, swiped to deep midwicket
floated outside off, AB gets under it and smokes the free-hit down the ground for six
guided to deep point
non-turning full ball, worked through square leg
slower ball down the leg side, helped to short fine leg. Smith fires a direct hit, but AB is home
full on off, whippy drive to long-on
back of a length and outside off, helped to third man
too full and outside off, AB stretches forward and cracks a drive past the covers, beats sweeper to his right
slower ball on off, AB skips out, whips it in the air, squarer of midwicket
full slower ball, patted towards mid-off
arm-ball, snakes in, blocked
slides on middle and leg, whipped to long-on
down the track, gets a full toss, and jabs to cover
drifts in on middle, chopped from the stumps to short third man
AB goes back and slaps this turning flat ball to sweeper cover
skiddy ball, Abdulla steps back and jams an inside edge onto the pad
slower ball outside off, 112ks, flat-batted to sweeper cover
slower short ball, cuts away from the left-hander. Abdulla shapes to upper cut and fails to connect. The caught-behind appeal is shot down. No spike on the Ultra Edge
banged in short and outside off, top-edged pull lands in front of long-on
full and angled in, jabbed back at the bowler, who fumbles, and gives away a run
Abdulla steps out and mis-hits this full ball to cover
rising short ball outside off, swatted over backward square leg
full and angling away outside off, slashes and misses
back of a length and outside off, chopped to sweeper cover
AB skips out, Smith shortens his length outside off. AB fiercely flat-bats it down the ground. He raises his half-century. Kohli is pumped
full and outside off, AB did not middle it. He swings, skews it, clearing Finch at long-off

AB dances out again, Smith bangs it short and outside off. AB flat-bat swings it to long-on. It dips in front of Bravo. He dives forward, lands awkwardly on the stomach, puts his body behind the ball, and ends up swatting it towards the fielding running in towards him from deep midwicket
back of a length on middle, pulled to deep midwicket
flatter and outside off, AB shuffles across off and sweeps it strongly over backward square leg. He got under it and nailed it. Kohli pumps his fists
back of a length and turns away outside off, forced to sweeper cover
slides on outside off, down the track and drilled to long-off
punched to sweeper cover
rank full toss outside off, Abdulla swipes and mis-hits it over deep midwicket. Finch can only tip it over the boundary
Abdulla charges down the track and drills it to long-on
98ks slower ball from round the wicket. Abdulla waits and dabs to midwicket
slower and outside off, 103ks, AB shuffles across and is early into the slog. Cue-ends it square on the off side
length ball on off, AB sizes it up, and slugs it high over midwicket. He timed the pants off that
PK replies with a middle-stump yorker, dug out
PK pushes it full on the leg stump/just outside leg, quick ball. Whoa! AB manipulates it. Reverse sweeps it past backward point, beats short third man as well. Precise placement. AB is a phenom
low full toss outside off, AB can't get under it. He drags it to wide long-on
quick back of a length ball outside off - 133ks, AB reverses his hands and aims for a scoop. Off the thigh and rolls away past DK for 4 leg byes
DK and Bravo go up in unison. Slower ball full and outside off, AB slashes and is beaten. No nick there
big dipper from Bravo, AB walks across, slogs and misses. Off the foot and to the keeper. Wided. Bravo is furious
full and on the pads, picked away to deep square leg
slower short ball on the leg stump, Abdulla shapes to pull. Flaps it fine on the leg side, the ball rolls into the RCB dug out
Abdulla steps out, this is a short ball on middle, Abdulla slashes and sends an outside edge, fine on the off side now
half-volley on the pads, flicked away behind square. Proper shot after a couple of miscued fours
pretty full on off, jabbed to long-on
low full toss on off, flicked away to wide long-on. RCB book their spot in the final. The RCB players charge onto the field
